express_delivery.delivery_time: Usluga "Narudžba s prioritetom obrade" (+2 €) ... ne garantiramo bržu dostavu (Priority processing service for +2€ does not guarantee faster delivery)
express_delivery.pricing: +2 € for priority processing, but not express delivery

weekend_delivery.days: DPD ne dostavlja subotom i nedjeljom. (DPD does not deliver on Saturdays and Sundays.)

HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostava na neka otočna mjesta: 6,50 €. Dostava na otoke može trajati duže od 5 radnih dana. (Delivery to some island locations: €6.50. Delivery to islands may take longer than 5 working days.)

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: Not specified, likely falls under the standard 4,80 € fee.
PARCEL_LOCKERS.cod_surcharge: The general COD surcharge of 0,95 € applies, but payment is made online via a link before pickup, not at the locker itself.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The primary delivery method is home delivery via DPD. DPD Parcel Locker (Pickup paketomat) is also an option. 
PRICING: Standard delivery costs 4,80 €, with free shipping on orders over 133 €. Delivery to some islands costs 6,50 €. Cash on delivery (COD) incurs a 0,95 € surcharge. 
DELIVERY TIME & RESTRICTIONS: Standard delivery takes 2-4 working days. Island deliveries can take over 5 days. There is no weekend delivery (Saturday/Sunday). 
NOTABLE FEATURES: A 'priority processing' service is offered for +2 €, but it does not guarantee faster delivery. For parcel locker pickups with COD, payment is made online via a secure link before collection. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is located on a clear, dedicated page. It effectively explains the standard delivery process, costs, and timelines. Information on parcel locker pickup is also provided. The site lacks specific information for bulky item delivery, in-store pickup, or parcel shop options.
